name: The Wave Story
description:
Where does it come from?
If so, do you have one?
Its History ?
Here it begins.....

In The Wave Story you will go through the most diverse enigmas, using audios, pictures, ciphers and more.
The challenge is continuous and is made more difficult with each part, can you finish your story? or will fall into limbo again?





The game is based on solving puzzles based on proposed hints,
the difficulty is gradual and intense.

The game contains a total of 10 puzzles, with many others hidden.
Can you find them?
Can you solve all the puzzles?
If so, your story has just begun.
